parameters.name: AssetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an asset.

parameters.name: DataSetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a data set.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the asset. When importing from Amazon S3, the Amazon S3 object key is used as the asset name. When exporting to Amazon S3, the asset name is used as default target Amazon S3 object key. When importing from Amazon API Gateway API, the API name is used as the asset name. When importing from Amazon Redshift, the datashare name is used as the asset name. When importing from AWS Lake Formation, the static values of 'Database(s) included in the LF-tag policy' or 'Table(s) included in LF-tag policy' are used as the name.

parameters.name: RevisionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a revision.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the asset.

nested_items.name: AssetDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the asset.

nested_items.name: S3SnapshotAsset
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 object that is the asset.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the Amazon S3 object that is the object.

nested_items.name: RedshiftDataShareAsset
nested_items.description: The Amazon Redshift datashare that is the asset.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the datashare asset.

nested_items.name: ApiGatewayApiAsset
nested_items.description: Information about the API Gateway API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiDescription
nested_items.description: The API description of the API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiEndpoint
nested_items.description: The API endpoint of the API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiKey
nested_items.description: The API key of the API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiName
nested_items.description: The API name of the API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiSpecificationDownloadUrl
nested_items.description: The download URL of the API specification of the API asset.

nested_items.name: ApiSpecificationDownloadUrlExpiresAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the upload URL expires, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: ProtocolType
nested_items.description: The protocol type of the API asset.

nested_items.name: Stage
nested_items.description: The stage of the API asset.

nested_items.name: S3DataAccessAsset
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 data access that is the asset.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket hosting data to be shared in the S3 data access.

nested_items.name: KeyPrefixes
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket used for hosting shared data in the Amazon S3 data access.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Keys
nested_items.description: S3 keys made available using this asset.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: S3AccessPointAlias
nested_items.description: The automatically-generated bucket-style alias for your Amazon S3 Access Point. Customers can access their entitled data using the S3 Access Point alias.

nested_items.name: S3AccessPointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for your Amazon S3 Access Point. Customers can also access their entitled data using the S3 Access Point ARN.

nested_items.name: KmsKeysToGrant
nested_items.description: List of AWS KMS CMKs (Key Management System Customer Managed Keys) and ARNs used to encrypt S3 objects being shared in this S3 Data Access asset. Providers must include all AWS KMS keys used to encrypt these shared S3 objects.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The AWS KMS CMK (Key Management System Customer Managed Key) used to encrypt S3 objects in the shared S3 Bucket. AWS Data exchange will create a KMS grant for each subscriber to allow them to access and decrypt their entitled data that is encrypted using this KMS key specified.

nested_items.name: LakeFormationDataPermissionAsset
nested_items.description: The AWS Lake Formation data permission that is the asset.

nested_items.name: LakeFormationDataPermissionDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the AWS Lake Formation data permission.

nested_items.name: LFTagPolicy
nested_items.description: Details about the LF-tag policy.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the AWS Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type for which the LF-tag policy applies.

nested_items.name: ResourceDetails
nested_items.description: Details for the Lake Formation Resources included in the LF-tag policy.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: A list of LF-tag conditions that apply to database resources.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key name for the LF-tag.

nested_items.name: TagValues
nested_items.description: A list of LF-tag values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: A list of LF-tag conditions that apply to table resources.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key name for the LF-tag.

nested_items.name: TagValues
nested_items.description: A list of LF-tag values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LakeFormationDataPermissionType
nested_items.description: The data permission type.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The permissions granted to the subscribers on the resource.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role's ARN that allows AWS Data Exchange to assume the role and grant and revoke permissions to AWS Lake Formation data permissions.

nested_items.name: AssetType
nested_items.description: The type of asset that is added to a data set.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the asset was created, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: DataSetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the data set associated with this asset.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the asset.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the asset. When importing from Amazon S3, the Amazon S3 object key is used as the asset name. When exporting to Amazon S3, the asset name is used as default target Amazon S3 object key. When importing from Amazon API Gateway API, the API name is used as the asset name. When importing from Amazon Redshift, the datashare name is used as the asset name. When importing from AWS Lake Formation, the static values of 'Database(s) included in the LF-tag policy'- or 'Table(s) included in LF-tag policy' are used as the asset name.

nested_items.name: RevisionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the revision associated with this asset.

nested_items.name: SourceId
nested_items.description: The asset ID of the owned asset corresponding to the entitled asset being viewed. This parameter is returned when an asset owner is viewing the entitled copy of its owned asset.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the asset was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
